prod_short_desc: Watch Axl become unstoppable on the battlefield!
prod_long_desc:
Give Axl a mechanized advantage with the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Battle Suit Axl play set, featuring a buildable battle suit with posable limbs, minifigure cockpit, super-sized buildable axe, giant fist and a Combo NEXO POWER shield. Includes five scannable shields for NEXO Powers that provide unique battle skills in the digital game and a new-for-spring-2017 Axl minifigure.
Includes a new-for-spring-2017 Axl minifigure.
Features a buildable battle suit with highly posable limbs and a minifigure cockpit.
Charge into battle with an even bigger Axl and send the Stone monsters flying!
Also includes a super-sized buildable axe.
Accessory elements include a Combo NEXO Power shield and five scannable NEXO Powers.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents' permission.
Scan shields for each of the five NEXO Powers (Shining Axe, Metal Minotaur, Tone of Power, Charging Attack and Banana Bombs) and create your own combinations to power up and defeat the Stone monsters in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game.
Combine with vehicles in other LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets to enhance the battle suit with futuristic functions!
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ characters on Cartoon Network.
Stands over 3” tall.
